resources.string: Wait until another player is ready
Choose the time allotted for the turn:
Name can contain letters, numbers and underscores
Password can contain only letters, numbers and underscores!
Do you really want to exit?
Another player want to play again
Name can contain only letters, numbers and underscores
The time must be less than

The playing field is a 10Ã—10 square for each player, on which a fleet of ships is placed. The verticals are numbered from top to bottom and the horizontals are marked with letters from left to right.

The instruction defines the conditions and sequence of moves:
			1. Initially, it is randomly chosen, who goes first.
			2. By taking the "shot", the player clicks on an enemy cell of the field.
			3. A cross is then placed in the cell; if hit, the cell is also painted over.
			4. If you miss, the right to move passes to another player; if you hit, the player turns again.
			5. A ship is considered sunk when all its cells are painted over. The winner is the one who first sinks all the ships of his opponent.
There is a time limit for each turn. The remaining time is shown by a red (green) line around the field.
If you do not make your turn in the allotted time, you automatically lose.
If anything remains unclear, here is link to more detailed rules:
